mapper.sql: user_id as userId, service_id as serviceId, `type`, appointment_time as appointmentTime, cost, create_time as createTime, status
mapper.select: select count(1) from ss_box_record where status = 1
mapper.insert: insert into ss_box_record (user_id, service_id, `type`, appointment_time, cost, create_time ) values (#{userId}, #{serviceId}, #{type}, #{appointmentTime}, #{cost}, now())
mapper.update: update ss_box_record set user_id = #{userId}, service_id = #{serviceId}, `type` = #{type}, appointment_time = #{appointmentTime}, cost = #{cost}, status = #{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: update ss_box_record set status = 0 where id = #{id}
